entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
